verbose_text: Nicorandil significantly suppressed the cleavage of caspase-3 under H/SD conditions in a concentration dependent manner, with the highest inhibitory effect observed in the group treated with 100 muM nicorandil (treated cells, 0.20 +/-0.04 vs. apoptotic control, 0.53 +/-0.06; XREF_FIG and D).
evidence: Nicorandil significantly suppressed the cleavage of caspase-3
